alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Western Marion (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 2:08PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A cluster of thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern and central Marion County through 245 PM EDT... At 208 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rainbow Lakes Estates, moving east at 20 mph. Additional storms will be near Ocala and the Interstate 75 corridor moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ocala, Rainbow Lakes Estates, Ocala Airport, Santos, Belleview and Romeo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
